detail_desc: Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops. Soft terry inside the feet.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops. Soft terry inside the feet.
High-waisted skirt in a sturdy jacquard knit containing some wool with a covered, rib-knit waistband and a slit at the back.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
KELZUKI x H&M. Skirt in print-patterned, sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim with a high comfort factor. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), and narrow hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Wide turned-up hem with an appliqué.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated, embroidered, lace-trimmed tops.
Semi-shiny tights with a push-up effect on the bum and a firm sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 70 denier.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.

Jacket in soft cotton velvet with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and fake welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Patterned lining.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated edge at the back. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch checked weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Cargo trousers in a linen and cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, front pockets and flap leg pockets. Fake fly and gently tapered legs that can be rolled up with a tab and button.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a shimmering print. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard at the top, and long raglan sleeves.
